scripts.setup: yarn run -s envvar-setup && yarn run -s heroku-setup
scripts.heroku-clean: heroku apps:destroy; git remote remove heroku
scripts.heroku-envvar: heroku config:set RAILS_MASTER_KEY=`cat config/master.key` && heroku config:set RAILS_ENV=production
scripts.heroku-setup: yarn run -s heroku-clean; heroku create && yarn run -s heroku-envvar && git push heroku master
